Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc19
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc19.Networking.Server

Class Server

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc19.Networking.Server.Server
Direct Known Subclasses:
MainServerRMI, MainServerTCP
public abstract class Server extends Object
This abstract class represents a generic server. In other words, some "network interfaces" of the application

  • Method Details

    • computeHashOfClientHandler

      protected String computeHashOfClientHandler(ClientHandler clientHandler, String username)
      This method is used to compute, with MD5, the hash of a ClientHandler object and nickname of its owner. That hash, will be used as secret token for reconnection.
      Parameters:
      clientHandler - the ClientHandler for which hash has to be computed
      username - the nickname of player owner
      Returns:
      a String hash of the ClientHandler object and nickname.

    • killClientHandlers

      protected abstract void killClientHandlers()
      This method is used to kill (e.g. disconnect forcibly) all connected clients.

    • runHeartBeatTesterForClient

      protected abstract void runHeartBeatTesterForClient()
      This method is used to check heart beat timing of connected clients. If client do not send heart beat message for more than Settings.MAX_DELTA_TIME_BETWEEN_HEARTBEATS it deletes it from lastHeartBeatOfClients hashmap, it sets it to inactive using MainController.setPlayerInactive(String). It doesn't remove it from connectedClients hashmap because client can reconnect, and thus it is necessary to keep its private token.

    • resetServer

      protected abstract void resetServer()
      This method reset server and MainController
